name: Back2Earth
description:
Back2Earth is a completely FREE Arcade game with unlimited levels!
Follow the spaceship arrow to collect stars. And after collecting the last star follow the compass to go Back 2 Earth on time!
No shooting, just maneuvering!
Avoid crashes with comets and UFOs!
Use friendly aliens help and support.
Destroy UFOs to gain some extra time :)

Watch advertisements (if u like) to increase each level win bonus to upgrade your spaceship and shield or watch ads to repair your shield for free!
Save your achievements in your Google+ account so you will have your progress anywhere any time!

Let us know what you think about the game:
